alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued August 09 at 5:17PM CDT until August 09 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 618 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST KANSAS CHEROKEE IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MISSOURI BARRY CHRISTIAN DADE DOUGLAS GREENE JASPER LAWRENCE MCDONALD NEWTON OZARK STONE TANEY WEBSTER WRIGHT THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANDERSON, AURORA, AVA, BAXTER SPRINGS, BRANSON, CARTHAGE, CASSVILLE, CHRISTIAN CENTER, COLUMBUS, CRANE, DAWSON, DOGWOOD, DUNCAN, EDGEWATER BEACH, ELSEY, FORSYTH, GOODHOPE, GOODMAN, GRAFF, GREENFIELD, HOLLISTER, INDIAN POINT, JOPLIN, KIMBERLING CITY, KIRBYVILLE, LOCKWOOD, LOWELL, MADRY, MANSFIELD, MARIONVILLE, MARSHFIELD, MEINERT, MONETT, MOUNT VERNON, MOUNTAIN GROVE, NEOSHO, NEUTRAL, NIXA, NOEL, NORTHVIEW, OZARK, OZARK BEACH, PINEVILLE, POWERSITE, RIVERTON, ROCKY COMFORT, ROGERSVILLE, ROME, SELMORE, SEYMOUR, SHERWIN, SILVER DOLLAR CITY, SOUTH WEST CITY, SPRINGFIELD, SQUIRES, STIPPVILLE, VANZANT, AND WASOLA.
